35class ShareGroup;

38namespace gl
39{
40class BufferManager;
41struct Caps;
42class Context;
43class FramebufferManager;
44class MemoryObjectManager;
45class ProgramPipelineManager;
46class Query;
47class RenderbufferManager;
48class SamplerManager;
49class SemaphoreManager;
50class ShaderProgramManager;
51class SyncManager;
52class TextureManager;
53class VertexArray;

55static constexpr Version ES_1_0 = Version(1, 0);
56static constexpr Version ES_1_1 = Version(1, 1);
57static constexpr Version ES_2_0 = Version(2, 0);
58static constexpr Version ES_3_0 = Version(3, 0);
59static constexpr Version ES_3_1 = Version(3, 1);
60static constexpr Version ES_3_2 = Version(3, 2);
61
62template <typename T>
63using BufferBindingMap = angle::PackedEnumMap<BufferBinding, T>;
64using BoundBufferMap = BufferBindingMap<BindingPointer<Buffer>>;
65using SamplerBindingVector = std::vector<BindingPointer<Sampler>>;
66using TextureBindingVector = std::vector<BindingPointer<Texture>>;
67using TextureBindingMap = angle::PackedEnumMap<TextureType, TextureBindingVector>;
68using ActiveQueryMap = angle::PackedEnumMap<QueryType, BindingPointer<Query>>;
69using BufferVector = std::vector<OffsetBindingPointer<Buffer>>;
70
71class ActiveTexturesCache final : angle::NonCopyable
72{
73 public:
74 ActiveTexturesCache();
75 ~ActiveTexturesCache();
76
77 Texture *operator[](size_t textureIndex) const { return mTextures[textureIndex]; }
78
79 void clear();
80 void set(size_t textureIndex, Texture *texture);
81 void reset(size_t textureIndex);
82 bool empty() const;
83
84 private:
85 ActiveTextureArray<Texture *> mTextures;
86};
87
88class State : angle::NonCopyable
89{
90 public:
91 State(const State *shareContextState,
92 egl::ShareGroup *shareGroup,
93 TextureManager *shareTextures,
94 SemaphoreManager *shareSemaphores,
95 const OverlayType *overlay,
96 const EGLenum clientType,
97 const Version &clientVersion,
98 bool debug,
99 bool bindGeneratesResource,
100 bool clientArraysEnabled,
101 bool robustResourceInit,
102 bool programBinaryCacheEnabled,
103 EGLenum contextPriority);
104 ~State();
105
106 void initialize(Context *context);
107 void reset(const Context *context);
108
109 // Getters
110 ContextID getContextID() const { return mID; }
111 EGLenum getClientType() const { return mClientType; }
112 EGLenum getContextPriority() const { return mContextPriority; }
113 GLint getClientMajorVersion() const { return mClientVersion.major; }
114 GLint getClientMinorVersion() const { return mClientVersion.minor; }
115 const Version &getClientVersion() const { return mClientVersion; }
116 const Caps &getCaps() const { return mCaps; }
117 const TextureCapsMap &getTextureCaps() const { return mTextureCaps; }
118 const Extensions &getExtensions() const { return mExtensions; }
119 const Limitations &getLimitations() const { return mLimitations; }
120 egl::ShareGroup *getShareGroup() const { return mShareGroup; }
121
122 bool isWebGL() const { return mExtensions.webglCompatibility; }
123
124 bool isWebGL1() const { return (isWebGL() && mClientVersion.major == 2); }
125
126 const TextureCaps &getTextureCap(GLenum internalFormat) const
127 {
128 return mTextureCaps.get(internalFormat);
129 }
130
131 // State chunk getters
132 bool allActiveDrawBufferChannelsMasked() const;
133 bool anyActiveDrawBufferChannelMasked() const;
134 const RasterizerState &getRasterizerState() const;
135 const BlendState &getBlendState() const { return mBlendState; }
136 const BlendStateExt &getBlendStateExt() const { return mBlendStateExt; }
137 const DepthStencilState &getDepthStencilState() const;
138
139 // Clear behavior setters & state parameter block generation function
140 void setColorClearValue(float red, float green, float blue, float alpha);
141 void setDepthClearValue(float depth);
142 void setStencilClearValue(int stencil);
143
144 const ColorF &getColorClearValue() const { return mColorClearValue; }
145 float getDepthClearValue() const { return mDepthClearValue; }
146 int getStencilClearValue() const { return mStencilClearValue; }
147
148 // Write mask manipulation
149 void setColorMask(bool red, bool green, bool blue, bool alpha);
150 void setColorMaskIndexed(bool red, bool green, bool blue, bool alpha, GLuint index);
151 void setDepthMask(bool mask);
152
153 // Discard toggle & query
154 bool isRasterizerDiscardEnabled() const { return mRasterizer.rasterizerDiscard; }
155 void setRasterizerDiscard(bool enabled);
156
157 // Primitive restart
158 bool isPrimitiveRestartEnabled() const { return mPrimitiveRestart; }
159 void setPrimitiveRestart(bool enabled);
160
161 // Face culling state manipulation
162 bool isCullFaceEnabled() const { return mRasterizer.cullFace; }
163 void setCullFace(bool enabled);
164 void setCullMode(CullFaceMode mode);
165 void setFrontFace(GLenum front);
166
167 // Depth test state manipulation
168 bool isDepthTestEnabled() const { return mDepthStencil.depthTest; }
169 bool isDepthWriteEnabled() const { return mDepthStencil.depthTest && mDepthStencil.depthMask; }
170 void setDepthTest(bool enabled);
171 void setDepthFunc(GLenum depthFunc);
172 void setDepthRange(float zNear, float zFar);
173 float getNearPlane() const { return mNearZ; }
174 float getFarPlane() const { return mFarZ; }
175
176 // Blend state manipulation
177 bool isBlendEnabled() const { return mBlendStateExt.mEnabledMask.test(0); }
178 bool isBlendEnabledIndexed(GLuint index) const
179 {
180 ASSERT(static_cast<size_t>(index) < mBlendStateExt.mMaxDrawBuffers);
181 return mBlendStateExt.mEnabledMask.test(index);
182 }
183 DrawBufferMask getBlendEnabledDrawBufferMask() const { return mBlendStateExt.mEnabledMask; }
184 void setBlend(bool enabled);
185 void setBlendIndexed(bool enabled, GLuint index);
186 void setBlendFactors(GLenum sourceRGB, GLenum destRGB, GLenum sourceAlpha, GLenum destAlpha);
187 void setBlendFactorsIndexed(GLenum sourceRGB,
188 GLenum destRGB,
189 GLenum sourceAlpha,
190 GLenum destAlpha,
191 GLuint index);
192 void setBlendColor(float red, float green, float blue, float alpha);
193 void setBlendEquation(GLenum rgbEquation, GLenum alphaEquation);
194 void setBlendEquationIndexed(GLenum rgbEquation, GLenum alphaEquation, GLuint index);
195 const ColorF &getBlendColor() const { return mBlendColor; }
196
197 // Stencil state maniupulation
198 bool isStencilTestEnabled() const { return mDepthStencil.stencilTest; }
199 void setStencilTest(bool enabled);
200 void setStencilParams(GLenum stencilFunc, GLint stencilRef, GLuint stencilMask);
201 void setStencilBackParams(GLenum stencilBackFunc, GLint stencilBackRef, GLuint stencilBackMask);
202 void setStencilWritemask(GLuint stencilWritemask);
203 void setStencilBackWritemask(GLuint stencilBackWritemask);
204 void setStencilOperations(GLenum stencilFail,
205 GLenum stencilPassDepthFail,
206 GLenum stencilPassDepthPass);
207 void setStencilBackOperations(GLenum stencilBackFail,
208 GLenum stencilBackPassDepthFail,
209 GLenum stencilBackPassDepthPass);
210 GLint getStencilRef() const { return mStencilRef; }
211 GLint getStencilBackRef() const { return mStencilBackRef; }
212
213 // Depth bias/polygon offset state manipulation
214 bool isPolygonOffsetFillEnabled() const { return mRasterizer.polygonOffsetFill; }
215 void setPolygonOffsetFill(bool enabled);
216 void setPolygonOffsetParams(GLfloat factor, GLfloat units);
217
218 // Multisample coverage state manipulation
219 bool isSampleAlphaToCoverageEnabled() const { return mSampleAlphaToCoverage; }
220 void setSampleAlphaToCoverage(bool enabled);
221 bool isSampleCoverageEnabled() const { return mSampleCoverage; }
222 void setSampleCoverage(bool enabled);
223 void setSampleCoverageParams(GLclampf value, bool invert);
224 GLclampf getSampleCoverageValue() const { return mSampleCoverageValue; }
225 bool getSampleCoverageInvert() const { return mSampleCoverageInvert; }
226
227 // Multisample mask state manipulation.
228 bool isSampleMaskEnabled() const { return mSampleMask; }
229 void setSampleMaskEnabled(bool enabled);
230 void setSampleMaskParams(GLuint maskNumber, GLbitfield mask);
231 GLbitfield getSampleMaskWord(GLuint maskNumber) const
232 {
233 ASSERT(maskNumber < mMaxSampleMaskWords);
234 return mSampleMaskValues[maskNumber];
235 }
236 std::array<GLbitfield, MAX_SAMPLE_MASK_WORDS> getSampleMaskValues() const
237 {
238 return mSampleMaskValues;
239 }
240 GLuint getMaxSampleMaskWords() const { return mMaxSampleMaskWords; }
241
242 // Multisampling/alpha to one manipulation.
243 void setSampleAlphaToOne(bool enabled);
244 bool isSampleAlphaToOneEnabled() const { return mSampleAlphaToOne; }
245 void setMultisampling(bool enabled);
246 bool isMultisamplingEnabled() const { return mMultiSampling; }
247
248 void setSampleShading(bool enabled);
249 bool isSampleShadingEnabled() const { return mIsSampleShadingEnabled; }
250 void setMinSampleShading(float value);
251 float getMinSampleShading() const { return mMinSampleShading; }
252
253 // Scissor test state toggle & query
254 bool isScissorTestEnabled() const { return mScissorTest; }
255 void setScissorTest(bool enabled);
256 void setScissorParams(GLint x, GLint y, GLsizei width, GLsizei height);
257 const Rectangle &getScissor() const { return mScissor; }
258
259 // Dither state toggle & query
260 bool isDitherEnabled() const { return mRasterizer.dither; }
261 void setDither(bool enabled);
262
263 // Generic state toggle & query
264 void setEnableFeature(GLenum feature, bool enabled);
265 void setEnableFeatureIndexed(GLenum feature, bool enabled, GLuint index);
266 bool getEnableFeature(GLenum feature) const;
267 bool getEnableFeatureIndexed(GLenum feature, GLuint index) const;
268
269 // Line width state setter
270 void setLineWidth(GLfloat width);
271 float getLineWidth() const { return mLineWidth; }
272
273 // Hint setters
274 void setGenerateMipmapHint(GLenum hint);
275 GLenum getGenerateMipmapHint() const;
276 void setTextureFilteringHint(GLenum hint);
277 GLenum getTextureFilteringHint() const;
278 GLenum getFragmentShaderDerivativeHint() const { return mFragmentShaderDerivativeHint; }
279 void setFragmentShaderDerivativeHint(GLenum hint);

281 // GL_CHROMIUM_bind_generates_resource
282 bool isBindGeneratesResourceEnabled() const { return mBindGeneratesResource; }
283
284 // GL_ANGLE_client_arrays
285 bool areClientArraysEnabled() const { return mClientArraysEnabled; }
286
287 // Viewport state setter/getter
288 void setViewportParams(GLint x, GLint y, GLsizei width, GLsizei height);
289 const Rectangle &getViewport() const { return mViewport; }
290
291 // Texture binding & active texture unit manipulation
292 void setActiveSampler(unsigned int active);
293 unsigned int getActiveSampler() const { return static_cast<unsigned int>(mActiveSampler); }
294
295 void setSamplerTexture(const Context *context, TextureType type, Texture *texture);
296 Texture *getTargetTexture(TextureType type) const;
297
298 Texture *getSamplerTexture(unsigned int sampler, TextureType type) const
299 {
300 ASSERT(sampler < mSamplerTextures[type].size());
301 return mSamplerTextures[type][sampler].get();
302 }
303
304 TextureID getSamplerTextureId(unsigned int sampler, TextureType type) const;
305 void detachTexture(const Context *context, const TextureMap &zeroTextures, TextureID texture);
306 void initializeZeroTextures(const Context *context, const TextureMap &zeroTextures);
307
308 void invalidateTextureBindings(TextureType type);
309
310 // Sampler object binding manipulation
311 void setSamplerBinding(const Context *context, GLuint textureUnit, Sampler *sampler);
312 SamplerID getSamplerId(GLuint textureUnit) const
313 {
314 ASSERT(textureUnit < mSamplers.size());
315 return mSamplers[textureUnit].id();
316 }
317
318 Sampler *getSampler(GLuint textureUnit) const { return mSamplers[textureUnit].get(); }
319
320 const SamplerBindingVector &getSamplers() const { return mSamplers; }
321
322 void detachSampler(const Context *context, SamplerID sampler);
323
324 // Renderbuffer binding manipulation
325 void setRenderbufferBinding(const Context *context, Renderbuffer *renderbuffer);
326 RenderbufferID getRenderbufferId() const { return mRenderbuffer.id(); }
327 Renderbuffer *getCurrentRenderbuffer() const { return mRenderbuffer.get(); }
328 void detachRenderbuffer(const Context *context, RenderbufferID renderbuffer);
329
330 // Framebuffer binding manipulation
331 void setReadFramebufferBinding(Framebuffer *framebuffer);
332 void setDrawFramebufferBinding(Framebuffer *framebuffer);
333 Framebuffer *getTargetFramebuffer(GLenum target) const;
334 Framebuffer *getReadFramebuffer() const { return mReadFramebuffer; }
335 Framebuffer *getDrawFramebuffer() const { return mDrawFramebuffer; }
336
337 bool removeReadFramebufferBinding(FramebufferID framebuffer);
338 bool removeDrawFramebufferBinding(FramebufferID framebuffer);
339
340 // Vertex array object binding manipulation
341 void setVertexArrayBinding(const Context *context, VertexArray *vertexArray);
342 bool removeVertexArrayBinding(const Context *context, VertexArrayID vertexArray);
343 VertexArrayID getVertexArrayId() const;
344
345 VertexArray *getVertexArray() const
346 {
347 ASSERT(mVertexArray != nullptr);
348 return mVertexArray;
349 }
350
351 // If both a Program and a ProgramPipeline are bound, the Program will
352 // always override the ProgramPipeline.
353 const ProgramExecutable *getProgramExecutable() const { return mExecutable; }
354
355 // Program binding manipulation
356 angle::Result setProgram(const Context *context, Program *newProgram);
357
358 Program *getProgram() const
359 {
360 ASSERT(!mProgram || !mProgram->isLinking());
361 return mProgram;
362 }
363
364 Program *getLinkedProgram(const Context *context) const
365 {
366 if (mProgram)
367 {
368 mProgram->resolveLink(context);
369 }
370 return mProgram;
371 }
372
373 ProgramPipeline *getProgramPipeline() const { return mProgramPipeline.get(); }
374
375 // Transform feedback object (not buffer) binding manipulation
376 void setTransformFeedbackBinding(const Context *context, TransformFeedback *transformFeedback);
377 TransformFeedback *getCurrentTransformFeedback() const { return mTransformFeedback.get(); }
378
379 ANGLE_INLINE bool isTransformFeedbackActive() const
380 {
381 TransformFeedback *curTransformFeedback = mTransformFeedback.get();
382 return curTransformFeedback && curTransformFeedback->isActive();
383 }
384 ANGLE_INLINE bool isTransformFeedbackActiveUnpaused() const
385 {
386 TransformFeedback *curTransformFeedback = mTransformFeedback.get();
387 return curTransformFeedback && curTransformFeedback->isActive() &&
388 !curTransformFeedback->isPaused();
389 }
390
391 bool removeTransformFeedbackBinding(const Context *context,
392 TransformFeedbackID transformFeedback);
393
394 // Query binding manipulation
395 bool isQueryActive(QueryType type) const;
396 bool isQueryActive(Query *query) const;
397 void setActiveQuery(const Context *context, QueryType type, Query *query);
398 QueryID getActiveQueryId(QueryType type) const;
399 Query *getActiveQuery(QueryType type) const;
400
401 // Program Pipeline binding manipulation
402 angle::Result useProgramStages(const Context *context,
403 ProgramPipeline *programPipeline,
404 GLbitfield stages,
405 Program *shaderProgram);
406 angle::Result setProgramPipelineBinding(const Context *context, ProgramPipeline *pipeline);
407 void detachProgramPipeline(const Context *context, ProgramPipelineID pipeline);
408
409 //// Typed buffer binding point manipulation ////
410 ANGLE_INLINE void setBufferBinding(const Context *context, BufferBinding target, Buffer *buffer)
411 {
412 (this->*(kBufferSetters[target]))(context, buffer);
413 }
414
415 ANGLE_INLINE Buffer *getTargetBuffer(BufferBinding target) const
416 {
417 switch (target)
418 {
419 case BufferBinding::ElementArray:
420 return getVertexArray()->getElementArrayBuffer();
421 default:
422 return mBoundBuffers[target].get();
423 }
424 }
425
426 ANGLE_INLINE Buffer *getArrayBuffer() const { return getTargetBuffer(BufferBinding::Array); }
427
428 angle::Result setIndexedBufferBinding(const Context *context,
429 BufferBinding target,
430 GLuint index,
431 Buffer *buffer,
432 GLintptr offset,
433 GLsizeiptr size);
434
435 size_t getAtomicCounterBufferCount() const { return mAtomicCounterBuffers.size(); }
436
437 ANGLE_INLINE bool hasValidAtomicCounterBuffer() const
438 {
439 return mValidAtomicCounterBufferCount > 0;
440 }
441
442 const OffsetBindingPointer<Buffer> &getIndexedUniformBuffer(size_t index) const;
443 const OffsetBindingPointer<Buffer> &getIndexedAtomicCounterBuffer(size_t index) const;
444 const OffsetBindingPointer<Buffer> &getIndexedShaderStorageBuffer(size_t index) const;
445
446 // Detach a buffer from all bindings
447 angle::Result detachBuffer(Context *context, const Buffer *buffer);
448
449 // Vertex attrib manipulation
450 void setEnableVertexAttribArray(unsigned int attribNum, bool enabled);
451 void setVertexAttribf(GLuint index, const GLfloat values[4]);
452 void setVertexAttribu(GLuint index, const GLuint values[4]);
453 void setVertexAttribi(GLuint index, const GLint values[4]);
454
455 ANGLE_INLINE void setVertexAttribPointer(const Context *context,
456 unsigned int attribNum,
457 Buffer *boundBuffer,
458 GLint size,
459 VertexAttribType type,
460 bool normalized,
461 GLsizei stride,
462 const void *pointer)
463 {
464 mVertexArray->setVertexAttribPointer(context, attribNum, boundBuffer, size, type,
465 normalized, stride, pointer);
466 mDirtyObjects.set(DIRTY_OBJECT_VERTEX_ARRAY);
467 }
468
469 ANGLE_INLINE void setVertexAttribIPointer(const Context *context,
470 unsigned int attribNum,
471 Buffer *boundBuffer,
472 GLint size,
473 VertexAttribType type,
474 GLsizei stride,
475 const void *pointer)
476 {
477 mVertexArray->setVertexAttribIPointer(context, attribNum, boundBuffer, size, type, stride,
478 pointer);
479 mDirtyObjects.set(DIRTY_OBJECT_VERTEX_ARRAY);
480 }
481
482 void setVertexAttribDivisor(const Context *context, GLuint index, GLuint divisor);
483 const VertexAttribCurrentValueData &getVertexAttribCurrentValue(size_t attribNum) const
484 {
485 ASSERT(attribNum < mVertexAttribCurrentValues.size());
486 return mVertexAttribCurrentValues[attribNum];
487 }
488
489 const std::vector<VertexAttribCurrentValueData> &getVertexAttribCurrentValues() const
490 {
491 return mVertexAttribCurrentValues;
492 }
493
494 const void *getVertexAttribPointer(unsigned int attribNum) const;
495
496 void bindVertexBuffer(const Context *context,
497 GLuint bindingIndex,
498 Buffer *boundBuffer,
499 GLintptr offset,
500 GLsizei stride);
501 void setVertexAttribFormat(GLuint attribIndex,
502 GLint size,
503 VertexAttribType type,
504 bool normalized,
505 bool pureInteger,
506 GLuint relativeOffset);
507
508 void setVertexAttribBinding(const Context *context, GLuint attribIndex, GLuint bindingIndex)
509 {
510 mVertexArray->setVertexAttribBinding(context, attribIndex, bindingIndex);
511 mDirtyObjects.set(DIRTY_OBJECT_VERTEX_ARRAY);
512 }
513
514 void setVertexBindingDivisor(GLuint bindingIndex, GLuint divisor);

516 // Pixel pack state manipulation
517 void setPackAlignment(GLint alignment);
518 GLint getPackAlignment() const { return mPack.alignment; }
519 void setPackReverseRowOrder(bool reverseRowOrder);
520 bool getPackReverseRowOrder() const { return mPack.reverseRowOrder; }
521 void setPackRowLength(GLint rowLength);
522 GLint getPackRowLength() const { return mPack.rowLength; }
523 void setPackSkipRows(GLint skipRows);
524 GLint getPackSkipRows() const { return mPack.skipRows; }
525 void setPackSkipPixels(GLint skipPixels);
526 GLint getPackSkipPixels() const { return mPack.skipPixels; }
527 const PixelPackState &getPackState() const { return mPack; }
528 PixelPackState &getPackState() { return mPack; }
529
530 // Pixel unpack state manipulation
531 void setUnpackAlignment(GLint alignment);
532 GLint getUnpackAlignment() const { return mUnpack.alignment; }
533 void setUnpackRowLength(GLint rowLength);
534 GLint getUnpackRowLength() const { return mUnpack.rowLength; }
535 void setUnpackImageHeight(GLint imageHeight);
536 GLint getUnpackImageHeight() const { return mUnpack.imageHeight; }
537 void setUnpackSkipImages(GLint skipImages);
538 GLint getUnpackSkipImages() const { return mUnpack.skipImages; }
539 void setUnpackSkipRows(GLint skipRows);
540 GLint getUnpackSkipRows() const { return mUnpack.skipRows; }
541 void setUnpackSkipPixels(GLint skipPixels);
542 GLint getUnpackSkipPixels() const { return mUnpack.skipPixels; }
543 const PixelUnpackState &getUnpackState() const { return mUnpack; }
544 PixelUnpackState &getUnpackState() { return mUnpack; }

571 bool isRobustResourceInitEnabled() const { return mRobustResourceInit; }

573 // Sets the dirty bit for the program executable.
574 angle::Result onProgramExecutableChange(const Context *context, Program *program);
575 // Sets the dirty bit for the program pipeline executable.
576 angle::Result onProgramPipelineExecutableChange(const Context *context,
577 ProgramPipeline *program);
578
579 enum DirtyBitType
580 {
581 // Note: process draw framebuffer binding first, so that other dirty bits whose effect
582 // depend on the current draw framebuffer are not processed while the old framebuffer is
583 // still bound.
584 DIRTY_BIT_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING,
585 DIRTY_BIT_READ_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING,
586 DIRTY_BIT_SCISSOR_TEST_ENABLED,
587 DIRTY_BIT_SCISSOR,
588 DIRTY_BIT_VIEWPORT,
589 DIRTY_BIT_DEPTH_RANGE,
590 DIRTY_BIT_BLEND_ENABLED,
591 DIRTY_BIT_BLEND_COLOR,
592 DIRTY_BIT_BLEND_FUNCS,
593 DIRTY_BIT_BLEND_EQUATIONS,
594 DIRTY_BIT_COLOR_MASK,
595 DIRTY_BIT_SAMPLE_ALPHA_TO_COVERAGE_ENABLED,
596 DIRTY_BIT_SAMPLE_COVERAGE_ENABLED,
597 DIRTY_BIT_SAMPLE_COVERAGE,
598 DIRTY_BIT_SAMPLE_MASK_ENABLED,
599 DIRTY_BIT_SAMPLE_MASK,
600 DIRTY_BIT_DEPTH_TEST_ENABLED,
601 DIRTY_BIT_DEPTH_FUNC,
602 DIRTY_BIT_DEPTH_MASK,
603 DIRTY_BIT_STENCIL_TEST_ENABLED,
604 DIRTY_BIT_STENCIL_FUNCS_FRONT,
605 DIRTY_BIT_STENCIL_FUNCS_BACK,
606 DIRTY_BIT_STENCIL_OPS_FRONT,
607 DIRTY_BIT_STENCIL_OPS_BACK,
608 DIRTY_BIT_STENCIL_WRITEMASK_FRONT,
609 DIRTY_BIT_STENCIL_WRITEMASK_BACK,
610 DIRTY_BIT_CULL_FACE_ENABLED,
611 DIRTY_BIT_CULL_FACE,
612 DIRTY_BIT_FRONT_FACE,
613 DIRTY_BIT_POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL_ENABLED,
614 DIRTY_BIT_POLYGON_OFFSET,
615 DIRTY_BIT_RASTERIZER_DISCARD_ENABLED,
616 DIRTY_BIT_LINE_WIDTH,
617 DIRTY_BIT_PRIMITIVE_RESTART_ENABLED,
618 DIRTY_BIT_CLEAR_COLOR,
619 DIRTY_BIT_CLEAR_DEPTH,
620 DIRTY_BIT_CLEAR_STENCIL,
621 DIRTY_BIT_UNPACK_STATE,
622 DIRTY_BIT_UNPACK_BUFFER_BINDING,
623 DIRTY_BIT_PACK_STATE,
624 DIRTY_BIT_PACK_BUFFER_BINDING,
625 DIRTY_BIT_DITHER_ENABLED,
626 DIRTY_BIT_RENDERBUFFER_BINDING,
627 DIRTY_BIT_VERTEX_ARRAY_BINDING,
628 DIRTY_BIT_DRAW_INDIRECT_BUFFER_BINDING,
629 DIRTY_BIT_DISPATCH_INDIRECT_BUFFER_BINDING,
630 // TODO(jmadill): Fine-grained dirty bits for each index.
631 DIRTY_BIT_PROGRAM_BINDING, // Must be before DIRTY_BIT_PROGRAM_EXECUTABLE
632 DIRTY_BIT_PROGRAM_EXECUTABLE,
633 // TODO(jmadill): Fine-grained dirty bits for each texture/sampler.
634 DIRTY_BIT_SAMPLER_BINDINGS,
635 DIRTY_BIT_TEXTURE_BINDINGS,
636 DIRTY_BIT_IMAGE_BINDINGS,
637 DIRTY_BIT_TRANSFORM_FEEDBACK_BINDING,
638 DIRTY_BIT_UNIFORM_BUFFER_BINDINGS,
639 DIRTY_BIT_SHADER_STORAGE_BUFFER_BINDING,
640 DIRTY_BIT_ATOMIC_COUNTER_BUFFER_BINDING,
641 DIRTY_BIT_MULTISAMPLING,
642 DIRTY_BIT_SAMPLE_ALPHA_TO_ONE,
643 DIRTY_BIT_COVERAGE_MODULATION, // CHROMIUM_framebuffer_mixed_samples
644 DIRTY_BIT_FRAMEBUFFER_SRGB, // GL_EXT_sRGB_write_control
645 DIRTY_BIT_CURRENT_VALUES,
646 DIRTY_BIT_PROVOKING_VERTEX,
647 DIRTY_BIT_SAMPLE_SHADING,
648 DIRTY_BIT_EXTENDED, // clip distances, mipmap generation hint, derivative hint.
649 DIRTY_BIT_INVALID,
650 DIRTY_BIT_MAX = DIRTY_BIT_INVALID,
651 };
652
653 static_assert(DIRTY_BIT_MAX <= 64, "State dirty bits must be capped at 64");
654
655 // TODO(jmadill): Consider storing dirty objects in a list instead of by binding.
656 enum DirtyObjectType
657 {
658 DIRTY_OBJECT_ACTIVE_TEXTURES, // Top-level dirty bit. Also see mDirtyActiveTextures.
659 DIRTY_OBJECT_TEXTURES_INIT,
660 DIRTY_OBJECT_IMAGES_INIT,
661 DIRTY_OBJECT_READ_ATTACHMENTS,
662 DIRTY_OBJECT_DRAW_ATTACHMENTS,
663 DIRTY_OBJECT_READ_FRAMEBUFFER,
664 DIRTY_OBJECT_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER,
665 DIRTY_OBJECT_VERTEX_ARRAY,
666 DIRTY_OBJECT_TEXTURES, // Top-level dirty bit. Also see mDirtyTextures.
667 DIRTY_OBJECT_IMAGES, // Top-level dirty bit. Also see mDirtyImages.
668 DIRTY_OBJECT_SAMPLERS, // Top-level dirty bit. Also see mDirtySamplers.
669 DIRTY_OBJECT_PROGRAM,
670 DIRTY_OBJECT_UNKNOWN,
671 DIRTY_OBJECT_MAX = DIRTY_OBJECT_UNKNOWN,
672 };
673
674 using DirtyBits = angle::BitSet<DIRTY_BIT_MAX>;
675 const DirtyBits &getDirtyBits() const { return mDirtyBits; }
676 void clearDirtyBits() { mDirtyBits.reset(); }
677 void clearDirtyBits(const DirtyBits &bitset) { mDirtyBits &= ~bitset; }
678 void setAllDirtyBits()
679 {
680 mDirtyBits.set();
681 mDirtyCurrentValues.set();
682 }
683
684 using DirtyObjects = angle::BitSet<DIRTY_OBJECT_MAX>;
685 void clearDirtyObjects() { mDirtyObjects.reset(); }
686 void setAllDirtyObjects() { mDirtyObjects.set(); }
687 angle::Result syncDirtyObjects(const Context *context,
688 const DirtyObjects &bitset,
689 Command command);
690 angle::Result syncDirtyObject(const Context *context, GLenum target);
691 void setObjectDirty(GLenum target);
692 void setTextureDirty(size_t textureUnitIndex);
693 void setSamplerDirty(size_t samplerIndex);
694
695 ANGLE_INLINE void setReadFramebufferDirty()
696 {
697 mDirtyObjects.set(DIRTY_OBJECT_READ_FRAMEBUFFER);
698 mDirtyObjects.set(DIRTY_OBJECT_READ_ATTACHMENTS);
699 }
700
701 ANGLE_INLINE void setDrawFramebufferDirty()
702 {
703 mDirtyObjects.set(DIRTY_OBJECT_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER);
704 mDirtyObjects.set(DIRTY_OBJECT_DRAW_ATTACHMENTS);
705 }

709 AttributesMask getAndResetDirtyCurrentValues() const;

721 const ActiveTexturesCache &getActiveTexturesCache() const { return mActiveTexturesCache; }
722 ComponentTypeMask getCurrentValuesTypeMask() const { return mCurrentValuesTypeMask; }

734 bool isCurrentTransformFeedback(const TransformFeedback *tf) const
735 {
736 return tf == mTransformFeedback.get();
737 }
738 bool isCurrentVertexArray(const VertexArray *va) const { return va == mVertexArray; }

740 GLES1State &gles1() { return mGLES1State; }
741 const GLES1State &gles1() const { return mGLES1State; }

745 template <BufferBinding Target>
746 void setGenericBufferBindingWithBit(const Context *context, Buffer *buffer);

751 using BufferBindingSetter = void (State::*)(const Context *, Buffer *);
752
753 ANGLE_INLINE bool validateSamplerFormats() const
754 {
755 return (!mExecutable ||
756 (mTexturesIncompatibleWithSamplers & mExecutable->getActiveSamplersMask()).none());
757 }

759 ProvokingVertexConvention getProvokingVertex() const { return mProvokingVertex; }
760 void setProvokingVertex(ProvokingVertexConvention val)
761 {
762 mDirtyBits.set(State::DIRTY_BIT_PROVOKING_VERTEX);
763 mProvokingVertex = val;
764 }

767 {
768 mDirtyBits.set(State::DIRTY_BIT_READ_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING);
769 }
770
771 ANGLE_INLINE void setDrawFramebufferBindingDirty()
772 {
773 mDirtyBits.set(State::DIRTY_BIT_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING);
774 }

804
805 bool hasConstantAlphaBlendFunc() const
806 {
807 return (mBlendFuncConstantAlphaDrawBuffers & mBlendStateExt.mEnabledMask).any();
808 }
809
810 bool hasSimultaneousConstantColorAndAlphaBlendFunc() const
811 {
812 return (mBlendFuncConstantColorDrawBuffers & mBlendStateExt.mEnabledMask).any() &&
813 hasConstantAlphaBlendFunc();
814 }
815
816 bool noSimultaneousConstantColorAndAlphaBlendFunc() const
817 {
818 return mNoSimultaneousConstantColorAndAlphaBlendFunc;
819 }
820
821 bool canEnableEarlyFragmentTestsOptimization() const
822 {
823 return !isSampleAlphaToCoverageEnabled();
824 }

859 private:
860 friend class Context;
861

863 void setActiveTextureDirty(size_t textureIndex, Texture *texture);

873
874 // Functions to synchronize dirty states
875 angle::Result syncActiveTextures(const Context *context, Command command);
876 angle::Result syncTexturesInit(const Context *context, Command command);
877 angle::Result syncImagesInit(const Context *context, Command command);
878 angle::Result syncReadAttachments(const Context *context, Command command);
879 angle::Result syncDrawAttachments(const Context *context, Command command);
880 angle::Result syncReadFramebuffer(const Context *context, Command command);
881 angle::Result syncDrawFramebuffer(const Context *context, Command command);
882 angle::Result syncVertexArray(const Context *context, Command command);
883 angle::Result syncTextures(const Context *context, Command command);
884 angle::Result syncImages(const Context *context, Command command);
885 angle::Result syncSamplers(const Context *context, Command command);
886 angle::Result syncProgram(const Context *context, Command command);
887
888 using DirtyObjectHandler = angle::Result (State::*)(const Context *context, Command command);
889 static constexpr DirtyObjectHandler kDirtyObjectHandlers[DIRTY_OBJECT_MAX] = {
890 &State::syncActiveTextures, &State::syncTexturesInit, &State::syncImagesInit,
891 &State::syncReadAttachments, &State::syncDrawAttachments, &State::syncReadFramebuffer,
892 &State::syncDrawFramebuffer, &State::syncVertexArray, &State::syncTextures,
893 &State::syncImages, &State::syncSamplers, &State::syncProgram};
894
895 // Robust init must happen before Framebuffer init for the Vulkan back-end.
896 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_ACTIVE_TEXTURES < DIRTY_OBJECT_TEXTURES_INIT, "init order");
897 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_TEXTURES_INIT < DIRTY_OBJECT_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER, "init order");
898 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_IMAGES_INIT < DIRTY_OBJECT_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER, "init order");
899 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_DRAW_ATTACHMENTS < DIRTY_OBJECT_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER, "init order");
900 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_READ_ATTACHMENTS < DIRTY_OBJECT_READ_FRAMEBUFFER, "init order");
901
902 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_ACTIVE_TEXTURES == 0, "check DIRTY_OBJECT_ACTIVE_TEXTURES index");
903 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_TEXTURES_INIT == 1, "check DIRTY_OBJECT_TEXTURES_INIT index");
904 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_IMAGES_INIT == 2, "check DIRTY_OBJECT_IMAGES_INIT index");
905 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_READ_ATTACHMENTS == 3, "check DIRTY_OBJECT_READ_ATTACHMENTS index");
906 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_DRAW_ATTACHMENTS == 4, "check DIRTY_OBJECT_DRAW_ATTACHMENTS index");
907 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_READ_FRAMEBUFFER == 5, "check DIRTY_OBJECT_READ_FRAMEBUFFER index");
908 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER == 6, "check DIRTY_OBJECT_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER index");
909 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_VERTEX_ARRAY == 7, "check DIRTY_OBJECT_VERTEX_ARRAY index");
910 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_TEXTURES == 8, "check DIRTY_OBJECT_TEXTURES index");
911 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_IMAGES == 9, "check DIRTY_OBJECT_IMAGES index");
912 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_SAMPLERS == 10, "check DIRTY_OBJECT_SAMPLERS index");
913 static_assert(DIRTY_OBJECT_PROGRAM == 11, "check DIRTY_OBJECT_PROGRAM index");
914
915 // Dispatch table for buffer update functions.
916 static const angle::PackedEnumMap<BufferBinding, BufferBindingSetter> kBufferSetters;

969 DepthStencilState mDepthStencil;

991 ProgramExecutable *mExecutable;
992
993 // GL_ANGLE_provoking_vertex
994 ProvokingVertexConvention mProvokingVertex;
995
996 using VertexAttribVector = std::vector<VertexAttribCurrentValueData>;
997 VertexAttribVector mVertexAttribCurrentValues; // From glVertexAttrib
998 VertexArray *mVertexArray;
999 ComponentTypeMask mCurrentValuesTypeMask;

1001 // Texture and sampler bindings
1002 size_t mActiveSampler; // Active texture unit selector - GL_TEXTURE0
1003
1004 TextureBindingMap mSamplerTextures;
1005
1006 // Active Textures Cache
1007 // ---------------------
1008 // The active textures cache gives ANGLE components access to a complete array of textures
1009 // on a draw call. gl::State implements angle::Observer and watches gl::Texture for state
1010 // changes via the onSubjectStateChange method above. We update the cache before draws.
1011 // See Observer.h and the design doc linked there for more info on Subject/Observer events.
1012 //
1013 // On state change events (re-binding textures, samplers, programs etc) we clear the cache
1014 // and flag dirty bits. nullptr indicates unbound or incomplete.
1015 ActiveTexturesCache mActiveTexturesCache;
1016 std::vector<angle::ObserverBinding> mCompleteTextureBindings;
1017
1018 ActiveTextureMask mTexturesIncompatibleWithSamplers;
1019
1020 SamplerBindingVector mSamplers;
1021
1022 // It would be nice to merge the image and observer binding. Same for textures.
1023 std::vector<ImageUnit> mImageUnits;
1024
1025 ActiveQueryMap mActiveQueries;
1026
1027 // Stores the currently bound buffer for each binding point. It has an entry for the element
1028 // array buffer but it should not be used. Instead this bind point is owned by the current
1029 // vertex array object.
1030 BoundBufferMap mBoundBuffers;
1031
1032 BufferVector mUniformBuffers;
1033 BufferVector mAtomicCounterBuffers;
1034 uint32_t mValidAtomicCounterBufferCount;
1035 BufferVector mShaderStorageBuffers;
1036
1037 BindingPointer<TransformFeedback> mTransformFeedback;
1038
1039 PixelUnpackState mUnpack;
1040 PixelPackState mPack;
1041
1042 bool mPrimitiveRestart;
1043
1044 Debug mDebug;
1045
1046 bool mMultiSampling;
1047 bool mSampleAlphaToOne;
1048
1049 GLenum mCoverageModulation;
1050
1051 // GL_EXT_sRGB_write_control
1052 bool mFramebufferSRGB;
1053
1054 // GL_ANGLE_robust_resource_initialization
1055 const bool mRobustResourceInit;
1056
1057 // GL_ANGLE_program_cache_control
1058 const bool mProgramBinaryCacheEnabled;
1059
1060 // GL_ANGLE_webgl_compatibility
1061 bool mTextureRectangleEnabled;
1062
1063 // GL_KHR_parallel_shader_compile
1064 GLuint mMaxShaderCompilerThreads;
1065
1066 // GL_APPLE_clip_distance/GL_EXT_clip_cull_distance
1067 ClipDistanceEnableBits mClipDistancesEnabled;
1068
1069 // GLES1 emulation: state specific to GLES1
1070 GLES1State mGLES1State;
1071
1072 DirtyBits mDirtyBits;
1073 DirtyObjects mDirtyObjects;
1074 mutable AttributesMask mDirtyCurrentValues;
1075 ActiveTextureMask mDirtyActiveTextures;
1076 ActiveTextureMask mDirtyTextures;
1077 ActiveTextureMask mDirtySamplers;
1078 ImageUnitMask mDirtyImages;
1079
1080 // The Overlay object, used by the backend to render the overlay.
1081 const OverlayType *mOverlay;
1082
1083 // OES_draw_buffers_indexed
1084 DrawBufferMask mBlendFuncConstantAlphaDrawBuffers;
1085 DrawBufferMask mBlendFuncConstantColorDrawBuffers;
1086 bool mNoSimultaneousConstantColorAndAlphaBlendFunc;
1087};
1088
1089ANGLE_INLINE angle::Result State::syncDirtyObjects(const Context *context,
1090 const DirtyObjects &bitset,
1091 Command command)
1092{
1093 const DirtyObjects &dirtyObjects = mDirtyObjects & bitset;
1094
1095 for (size_t dirtyObject : dirtyObjects)
1096 {
1097 ANGLE_TRY((this->*kDirtyObjectHandlers[dirtyObject])(context, command));
1098 }
1099
1100 mDirtyObjects &= ~dirtyObjects;
1101 return angle::Result::Continue;
1102}
